product_description: Dolman cap sleeves and a drapey funnel neck bring refined ease to this top made from a wonderfully soft and sustainable stretch jersey.
product_details_and_care:
Dolman cap sleeves and a drapey funnel neck bring refined ease to this top made from a wonderfully soft and sustainable stretch jersey.
Funnel neck
Short sleeves
93% Tencel® lyocell, 7% spandex
Tencel lyocell is a sustainably produced fiber made with closed-loop processing
Machine wash, tumble dry
Made in the USA
Item #6074593
product_size_info:
Oversized by design; if ordering Eileen Fisher for the first time, order one size down.
XXS=0, XS=2-4, S=6-8, M=10-12, L=14-16, XL=18 (14W-16W).
